A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite a few pointless scenes with Benico Del Toro\, Captain Phasma being wasted once again\, The Forced relationship between Finn and Rose\, Star Wars: The Last Jedi was a damn good movie. I loved every moment of this film. Rian Johnson really brought his A game with this film and Believe it or not\, This actually the first Rian Johnson film I have seen. I still need to go watch Looper because I heard that’s amazing. But anyways\, back to Star Wars. So in the Last Jedi\, we pick up where we left off
